body: This was something I added in order to support initializing scalar UInt8 tensors from scalar byte values. But it's not clear we want to support that. Maybe should go into a separate PR?
body_html: This was something I added in order to support initializing scalar UInt8 tensors from scalar byte values. But it's not clear we want to support that. Maybe should go into a separate PR?
